trans-unit.source: Defines column-specific properties that apply to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Define as propriedades de coluna específicas que se aplicam a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: ColumnDefinition uses its own special structure, a <xref:System.Windows.GridLength>, to describe its width characteristics.
trans-unit.target: ColumnDefinition usa sua própria estrutura especial, um <xref:System.Windows.GridLength>, para descrever suas características de largura.</xref:System.Windows.GridLength>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLength> allows a ColumnDefinition to support variable distribution of available space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.GridLength>permite que um ColumnDefinition dar suporte a distribuição de variável de espaço disponível.</xref:System.Windows.GridLength>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the actual calculated width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa a largura calculada real de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is a calculated value that is based on other width inputs and the layout system.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é um valor calculado com base nas outras entradas de largura e o sistema de layout.

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the ActualWidth for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, ActualWidth para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the actual calculated width in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a largura real calculada em pixels independentes de dispositivo.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a largura máxima de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values together in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A> value takes precedence over the MaxWidth value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa esses valores juntos no mesmo exemplo de código, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A>valor tem precedência sobre o valor MaxWidth, que por sua vez, tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* representação de cadeia de caracteres um valor maior que ou igual a `0.0034` mas igual a ou menor `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor não qualificado é medido em pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres não precisam explicitamente incluir pontos decimais.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* um *duplo* valor conforme descrito acima, (com exceção da `Auto`) seguido por um dos seguintes especificadores de unidade: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(padrão) é [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` polegadas; em 1 = = 96px `cm` centímetros; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` pontos; 1pt==(96/72) px # # informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the maximum width.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a largura máxima.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a largura mínima de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values together in the same code example, the MinWidth value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa esses valores juntos no mesmo exemplo de código, o valor de MinWidth tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A>valor, que por sua vez, tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns , the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* representação de cadeia de caracteres um valor maior que ou igual a `0.0034` mas igual a ou menor `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor não qualificado é medido em pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres não precisam explicitamente incluir pontos decimais.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* um *duplo* valor conforme descrito acima, (com exceção da `Auto`) seguido por um dos seguintes especificadores de unidade: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(padrão) é [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` polegadas; em 1 = = 96px `cm` centímetros; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` pontos; 1pt==(96/72) px # # informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the minimum width.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a largura mínima.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the offset value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o valor de deslocamento deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset of the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa o deslocamento da coluna.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated width of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref> element, or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> value of a column that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a largura calculada de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref> elemento ou conjuntos a <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> valor de uma coluna que é definida pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> is <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>é <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> </xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> that represents the width of the Column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> que representa a largura da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
